original_text: So the priest gave him hallowed bread: for there was no bread there but the shewbread, that was taken from before the Lord, to put hot bread in the day when it was taken away.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 거룩한 떡을 주었으니 거기는 진설병 곧 여호와 앞에서 물려 낸 떡밖에 없었음이라 이 떡은 더운 떡을 드리는 날에 물려 낸 것이더라

sentences.original_text: So the priest gave him hallowed bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제사장은 그에게 거룩한 빵을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: for there was no bread there
that was taken from before the Lord
to put hot bread in the day
